categories.name: Education
categories.description: Payment in schools, universities and colleges, as well as payment for specialized training: business, arts, sports, driving.

categories.name: Entertainment
categories.description: Payments at bowling alleys, amusement parks, circuses and other leisure facilities

categories.name: Flowers
categories.description: Payment in flower shops, floristry salons and specialized gardening shops

categories.name: Taxi
categories.description: Payment to drivers and online taxi services. This doesn't include carsharing.
